data.text: @0Sleepyjoey2 @CTVNews Actually, that wasn't a list of side effects. They were things found in people after they took the shot but weren't tested for beforehand. One of the things on that list is swallowing a penny. If you read things instead of assuming you might come across as not an idiot
@stepper115 @CTVNews "However, just because someone reports an adverse event doesn't mean it was caused by the vaccine itself."
@CTVNews However, just because someone reports an adverse event doesn't mean it was caused by the vaccine itself.

@Raymond_P90 @CTVNews Really? I’ve never heard of anti vaccine propaganda in MSM. It’s always the other direction. I’m actually quite shocked (and delighted) that CTV has the balls to tweet out any information that would support anti vaxx sentiment. Proud of you @CTVNews 👍
@CTVNews Time to start preparing the lawsuit against government for make mandatory vaccines and now a lot of ppl are having health issues
@londorondo @Bubsy2000 @CTVNews I'm glad you admit you are misinterpreting the data.
@Baby_Beluga25 @CTVNews ok .just asking then yes it could be the antibiotic

@CTVNews The report was released in November 2021….it’s not newly released data. Even more shocking data has been released in March 2022. Please state the correct facts. Do not mislead the public. We need honesty. ESP when there have been many adverse reactions.
